item.title: Over engineering file transfer
item.description: Context On Thursdays, I take my younger daughter to a swimming lessons. Sometimes, I take my GoPro with me. I take a video during the lesson and when I get home I edit the video, upload and share it with friends and family. In the last few days, I realized that I may not be able to connect mass storage devices to my laptop, so I tried to find another solution to transfer the files from my GoPro to my laptop.
